name: Triip
description:
Triip is the only travel platform enabling travelers to book seamlessly 1,113,953 hotel rooms in 227 countries and 6,000 authentic local experiences (?triips?) in 100 countries. Not only we have the best price in the world for hotels (via Booking.com partnership), we are the only one that gives back all of our commission via cryptocurrencies.

Travelers can book a room on our platform in 227 countries, check-in, enjoy a unique tour offered by local and receive cashback via BTC/ETH/TriipMiles.

Currently, we have been able to compete with giant OTAs on price and extra value.

Triip is profitable
After 4 years of operation and US$835,000 investment from Gobi Ventures/Mavcap, MAP2 Ventures, Gaiax Ventures and angel investors, Triip was profitable since October 2017.

Triip.me has real product and revenue in more than 200 countries within the travel industry. Our product, customers, partners are real with solid track records. Not another blockchain start-up.
